content: Write a flamenco song about passionate love. The lyrics should be fiery, intense, and filled with raw emotion.

[Verse 1]
In the heart of the night, when the world is asleep,
I feel your presence, like a flame that won't cease.
Your eyes, they burn brighter than the stars in the sky,
And your touch, it sets my soul on fire, oh don't you deny.

[Chorus]
Oh, passion, passion, burning deep within,
A fiery love that never lets go, never again.
With every beat of my heart, with every breath I take,
I'm lost in your embrace, in this passionate love that we make.

[Verse 2]
The guitar cries out, its strings singing your name,
Each note a whisper, each chord a burning flame.
The rhythm pulsates through my veins, wild and free,
In this dance of desire, where only you and I can be.

[Chorus]
Oh, passion, passion, scorching hot and true,
A lover's flame that consumes us, me and you.
Through highs and lows, through joy and through pain,
This love is our everything, our eternal refrain.

[Bridge]
Let's surrender to this fire, let it consume our fears,
In this moment, only love remains, nothing else compares.
With every step, with every spin, with every kiss we share,
We're writing our own story, in this passionate affair.

[Chorus]
Oh, passion, passion, wild and untamed,
A love so fierce, it makes the world sway and claim.
Hand in hand, heart to heart, forever entwined,
In this passionate love, where our spirits combine.

[Outro]
So here's to the nights, under the moon so bright,
To the love that burns, day and night.
May our passion never fade, may it always glow,
In this flamenco song, where our love continues to grow.

**Note:** Flamenco is a passionate Andalusian art form that includes singing (cante), guitar playing (toque), and dance (baile). The lyrics are often about deep emotions, love, and suffering. This song attempts to capture the essence of passionate love in the style of flamenco, with fiery and intense imagery.
